mdRecord.dcterms:title: Men at a Service Station
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Service station photographs, the first one with a man posing with a pump in front of the station, three photographs of uplifted cars being worked on by mechanics, a photograph with three men in front of the station, and a pair of men in front of a pump and a car at the service station, undated
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
